columns.name: eventCode
columns.description: Movement or milestone code. Can hold a named individual of the StatusCode core code list (corresponding to cXML code list 1.18); but can also be referring to different code lists.

columns.name: eventTimeType
columns.description: Indicates type of event e.g.  Scheduled; Estimated; Actual - Indicates type of event e.g.  Scheduled; Estimated; Actual

columns.name: recordingActor
columns.description: Reference to the Actor recording the LogisticsEvent - Reference to the Actor recording the LogisticsEvent

columns.name: recordingOrganization
columns.description: Organization recording the LogisticsEvent - Organization recording the LogisticsEvent - Organization recording the LogisticsEvent

columns.name: creationDate
columns.description: DateTime at which the LogisticsEvent was posted

columns.name: eventDate
columns.description: Date and time of the event

columns.name: eventName
columns.description: If no EventCode provided; event name - e.g. Security clearance

columns.name: partialEventIndicator
columns.description: Boolean indicating that the LogisticsEvent is only applicable for parts of the LogisticObject it was recorded for; for example for some Pieces of a Shipment
